title: help & support ?
body:
Where am i supposed to go and ask about my client not allowing me to enter games if not here?

my previous post got deleted saying that i'm not supposed to argue about my punishment on this forum, simply because i mentioned that i'm getting punished by leaverbuster. 

i was not argueing about the punishment, but rather that it was a problem that follows the intial problem of not letting me into the game, so just deleteing my post seems kinda wierd to me, kinda feels like however did it didn't even bother to read it in the first place....

So the question still remains, where am i supposed to get help WITH MY CLIENT, not allowing me to enter games if not on help & support???!?!?!?!?!

sincerely

a VERY frustarted man.

replies.body:
Hey there, I didn't moderate your previous post but I'm sorry for the frustrations you're feeling right now.  :/  I took a look just in case, though, and it seems that your previous post was perceived more as a discussion on the leaverbuster system and not necessarily requesting assistance with a technical issue.  If you have any questions about that, though, you'll want to hit up the moderators on discord.

Otherwise, I'm happy to help get this troubleshooted!  If you're having issues reaching to the game server, I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to both tune up and rule out possibilities that might be causing the instability.  Keep in mind, even though it may not be your intention to leave games, the system is still going to treat them all equally due to the negative experiences they cause.

Let me know if that clears things up!
